title: The Classroom
subtle: Factual Description (nonfiction), 20 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 0L
description: The Classroom provides an overview of several familiar classroom objects. Photographs establish one-to-one correspondence and support readers who are learning to look at print.
meta: backpack, book, classroom, chair, desk, eraser, paper, pencil
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Nouns : Recognize and understand that nouns are naming words
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and write the high-frequency word the
